channel.title: No one can connect to my server
channel.description: okay well, i have my server up and running and for everyone it says Error Connecting To Server. This just happened today and i have no clue, everything is set up correctly, i have my no-ip working.(has nothing to do with the problem i believe) it was working yesterday, i haven't changed anything on the server at all, and i was wondering if someone could TV and identify and fix the problem or at least look at it

item.title: No one can connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Brandontan:

i reselected my host and boom it worked

There we go. Good job

Read full topic
